    • Method Detail

      • isPluginLoaded

        public static boolean isPluginLoaded(AbstractPlugin plugin)
        Tells whether or not the given plugin was already loaded.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the plugin was already loaded, false otherwise
        Since:
        2.4.3

      • loadedPlugin

        public static void loadedPlugin(AbstractPlugin plugin)
        Adds the given loaded plugin to the PluginFactory. Loaded plugins, are used by the active scanner, if enabled.

        Call to this method has not effect it the plugin was already added.

        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin that should be loaded
        Since:
        2.4.0
        See Also:
        isPluginLoaded(AbstractPlugin)

      • loadedPlugin

        @Deprecated
public static boolean loadedPlugin(String className)
        Deprecated. (2.4.3) Use loadedPlugin(AbstractPlugin) instead, the status of the scanner is not properly set.
        See Also:
        AbstractPlugin.getStatus()

      • unloadedPlugin

        public static void unloadedPlugin(AbstractPlugin plugin)

      • unloadedPlugin

        @Deprecated
public static boolean unloadedPlugin(String className)
        Deprecated. (2.4.3) Use unloadedPlugin(AbstractPlugin) instead, which ensures that the exact scanner instance is unloaded.
